item.title: Story Behind Bandla’s Return to BRS
item.description:
<![CDATA[Story Behind Bandla’s Return to BRS
We are M9 , use this new URL M9.news for latest updates.
Gadwal is the second constituency in Telangana where ruling Congress politics backfired after Jagithyal in Operation Akarsh. Saritha Tirupatiah, from the joint Palamuru district, previously served as the chairperson of the Zilla Parishad. She got the ticket for Gadwala MLA after joining the Congress party before the assembly elections against the BRS.
Also Read – Prashant Kishor’s First Election: Inte...]]>
item.author: Sridhar Raavi

item.title: Despite KCR's efforts to keep flock together, BRS at receiving end with desertion of MLAs, MLCs
item.description:
<![CDATA[Despite KCR's efforts to keep flock together, BRS at receiving end with desertion of MLAs, MLCs
Till date, seven MLAs and six MLCs of BRS switched over to the Congress since the Assembly polls. Several other leaders, including BRS Rajya Sabha member K Keshav Rao, his daughter and Hyderabad Mayor Vijaya Laxmi R Gadwal, also joined the Congress....]]>

item.title: V Lakshminarayana Assumes Charge as Additional Collector (Revenue)
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: V. Lakshminarayana assumed charge as the Additional Collector (Revenue) of Jogulamba Gadwal district on Monday. He took over his duties in his chamber at the Integrated District Offices Complex. Prior to assuming charge, he met Collector B. M. Santosh at the camp office for a courtesy visit.
Previously, Lakshminarayana served in the Land Acquisition Department of GHMC, Hyderabad, and was transferred to the district as the Additional Collector. Srinivas Rao, who had been handling full ad...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: DK Aruna a Frontrunner for Union Cabinet
item.description:
<![CDATA[HYDERABAD: BJP vice-president D.K. Aruna is likely to find a berth in the Union Cabinet. As a prominent political figure in the state, the BJP feels that she can strongly counter the Congress government in Telangana at the national stage.
Hailing from a political family, the BJP’s MP-elect from Mahbubnagar had once taken former chief minist er K. Chandrashekar Rao head on, when she was a legislator from Gadwal.
Aruna’s family has maintained a strong bond with people over the decades. Her fathe...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author

item.title: Gadwal Police Crack Day Light Theft Cases , Recover 19 Tulas of Gold
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal Police Crack Day Light Theft Cases , Recover 19 Tulas of Gold.In a significant breakthrough, the Gadwal police have successfully solved a series of daylight thefts that targeted three houses in Gadwal town and Gattu village. The authorities arrested the accused, Nandine Mahesh, a 30-year-old laborer from Nandinne Village, and recovered 19 tolas of stolen gold.
The accused, driven by financial difficulties and addiction to alcohol, committed the burglaries during the day when the ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
